Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class IngredientModel

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.IngredientModel
public class IngredientModel extends Object
Represents an ingredient record within the POS system.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this ingredient.

      The toString() method is overridden to return the ingredient's name, which is useful for displaying ingredient names in UI components such as ComboBoxes.

      Overrides:

      Returns:
